extendedInfo.description: Love story app keywords: love quotes, love sms, love story, love text, love poem, quotes on love.Express Your Love with impressive Love StoriesExpression of love depends on how u reveal your heart feelings in to words. Here are some of the short romantic as well as sad love stories available in this app. This story you can share on facebook and twitter and let the person know how much you love them from the deep of your heart. You need to convey your feelings in such a way to build a strong relationship.Claruss App has recently introduced love stories app so you can easily reveal the feelings.Here are a few benefits of downloading love text app onto your iPhone-â¢	Love stories appears randomlyâ¢	Over 500 love stories.â¢	Impressive and user friendly GUIâ¢	Send the stories via email, SMS, or can copy them to the clipboardâ¢	Share them on facebook & TwitterHow Does Love Quotes App Work?After you download this application on your iPhone you can fetch wide variety of love stories that can have happy ending as well happy ending. Well defined GUI, where the tab are provided to share this stories on Facebook and Twitter. You can also view this stories listing wise as well as detailing. You can add this stories to your favorites so that next time whenever you use this you can make out easily you favorite stories.OS CompatibilityLove stoies app compatible with2.2 or later.Download Love stories app online and surprise your beloved with your unique style of acknowledgement.
